completeListOfAbilities.name: BRV Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV

completeListOfAbilities.name: HP Attack
completeListOfAbilities.desc: Expends BRV to deal HP damage

completeListOfAbilities.name: Lancet
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP
Self: 3 turns Ronso Traits
Becomes Lancet & Thrust Kick、 HP Attack becomes Jump while Ronso Traits active

ailments.name: Ronso Traits
ailments.desc: Ronso Traits: Raises own MAX BRV、 ATK; raises party's DEF (does not stack)

passives.desc: Slightly raises SPD with active buff
passives.short_desc: Speed Buff: Raises SPD

passives.short_desc: Mighty Mighty Guard & Bad Breath: Increases BRV damage dealt with Mighty Guard & Bad Breath

passives.name: Buff Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV with active buffs

passives.name: Charged Lancet
passives.desc: Lancet use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Lancet: Raises use count of Lancet

passives.name: BRV Reprieve
passives.desc: When BRV is at least 50% MAX BRV、 Break is avoided and BRV drops to 1
passives.short_desc: BRV Reprieve: Break is avoided and BRV drops to 1 if BRV is over a certain amount

passives.name: Charged Mighty Guard
passives.desc: Mighty Guard use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Mighty Guard: Raises use count of Mighty Guard

passives.name: Ronso Guardian
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 DEF while Ronso Traits active
passives.short_desc: Ronso Guardian: Raises party's MAX BRV、 DEF

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK with active buff
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Lancet Extension
passives.desc:
When using Lancet、 Lancet & Thrust Kick:
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slight raised MAX BRV、 ATK boost、 moderate raised DEF boost from Ronso Traits

When using Lancet:
 • BRV attack hit count increased by 1; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage

When using Lancet & Thrust Kick:
 • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

While Ronso Traits active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)

When using Jump:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
passives.short_desc: Lancet Extension: Boost to Lancet

passives.name: All Buffed Attack Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK with active buff
passives.short_desc: All Buffed Attack Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Mighty Guard Extension
passives.desc: When using Mighty Guard & Bad Breath:\n • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
passives.short_desc: Mighty Guard Extension: Boost to Mighty Guard

passives.name: Shelter Resonance
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's ATK、 DEF
passives.short_desc: Shelter Resonance: Raises party's ATK、 DEF

passives.name: All Attack Guard Up Extension
passives.desc: When using All Attack Guard Up:\n • Marginal raised party ATK boost\n • Slight raised party DEF boost
passives.short_desc: All Attack Guard Up Extension: Boost to All Attack Guard Up

passive.name: All Attack Guard Up Growth
passive.desc: All Attack Guard Up use +1\n\nAll Attack Guard Up effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: All Attack Guard Up Growth: Boost to All Attack Guard Up

passive.name: Protect Up
passive.desc: Reduces own HP damage taken by 10%
passive.short_desc: Protect Up: Reduces HP damage taken

passive.name: Ronso Soul
passive.desc:
When using Lancet、 Lancet & Thrust Kick:
 • BRV damage boost
 • HP restored based on HP damage dealt extended to party
 • HP recovered in excess of MAX HP based on HP damage dealt added to BRV
 • Ronso Traits boost、 duration+

passive.name: Inherited Wish
passive.desc:
When using Mighty Guard、 Mighty Guard & Bad Breath:
 • Boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • HP Damage Resist boost、 duration+

When using Mighty Guard & Bad Breath:
 • BRV damage boost
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Bad Breath boost、 duration+
passive.short_desc: Inherited Wish: Boost to Mighty Guard

passives.name: Mighty Nova
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Nova
passives.short_desc: Mighty Nova: Increases BRV damage dealt with Nova

passives.name: Nova Debuff Plus
passives.desc: When using Nova:\n • Target: 1 turn Total Blindness
passives.short_desc: Nova Debuff Plus: Inflicts Total Blindness when using Nova

passives.name: Nova Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Nova
passives.short_desc: Nova Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Nova

passive.name: Unbreakable Pride Extension
passive.short_desc: Unbreakable Pride Extension: Boost to Nova

passives.name: Nova Advance
passives.desc: When using Nova:\nStolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
passives.short_desc: Nova Advance: Boost to Nova

passives.name: Unbreakable Pride Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Astral Spear (X)+ or passive ability Unbreakable Pride Extension:\n • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Unbreakable Pride Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Lancet Buff Starting Recast MAX
passives.desc: 6 turns Ronso Traits、 full recast gauge at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Lancet Buff Starting Recast MAX: Ronso Traits、 full recast gauge at start of quest

passives.name: Nova BRV Hit Plus Force Advance
passives.desc: When using Nova:\n • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Nova BRV Hit Plus Force Advance: Boost to Nova
